code: import{createStore,applyMiddleware}from'redux';import createSagaMiddleware from'redux-saga';import rootReducer from"./../reducers/rootReducer";import rootSaga from"./../sagas/rootSaga";var sagaMiddleware=createSagaMiddleware();var store=createStore(rootReducer,applyMiddleware(sagaMiddleware));sagaMiddleware.run(rootSaga);export default store;
